title: Transportation as Health Infrastructure
prompt: A weathered pickup truck parked on a quiet rural county road at golden hour, shot from a low angle emphasizing the vehicle's worn detailsâ€”dust on the hood, faded paint, practical interior visible through the window. In the soft background, a distant small-town clinic or medical building barely visible across flat farmland. The composition should convey utility and necessity rather than hardship, with warm amber light casting long shadows across the asphalt. Documentary style, intimate scale, focus on the texture of rural transportation as infrastructure.
